intro:
Color 16 of the World’s Favorite Cars for Kids!
Talk about cars together with mom and dad while coloring.
description:
The new joy of the Crayon Series, “Crayon Car”, has finally arrived!
It’s a coloring experience that sparks both children’s imagination and curiosity about cars.

From sports cars to fire trucks and police cars—lots of fun car characters are waiting!
Use the Nintendo Switch™ touchscreen to create your very own unique car colors!

Special Features
Real Crayon Feel
Experience the texture of real crayons at your fingertips, letting kids color in every detail—from wheels to bodywork.

Wide Variety of Vehicles & Templates
Race cars, trucks, buses, trains, excavators, and more!
Kids can freely color all kinds of vehicles from their imagination.

Creativity & Sense of Achievement
Through the star and reward system, kids are encouraged to complete their creations while feeling a true sense of accomplishment.

Recommended for:
Kids who love cars and need a new activity to enjoy

Families who want to keep children entertained while traveling or going out

Parents, siblings, and friends looking for a fun coloring game to enjoy together

Safe & Fun
Coloring available anytime, even offline

Optimized for Nintendo Switch™

One purchase for the whole family to enjoy for a long time

“Crayon Car” lets kids unleash their creativity while fueling their fascination with cars!
Children will love completing their own original cars, while families can share the joy and make lasting memories together.

 Start your colorful car-coloring adventure today!
